summary: Ecommerce website for Mosslight Studios with admin backend, customer portal, and social media content gallery
architectural_notes: Ecommerce platform with admin and customer-facing components
Multi-platform social media content aggregation for gallery
User authentication system for customer portal and admin access
Admin authentication uses 8-digit passcode (09131991) separate from customer Internet Identity
Unified admin dashboard provides complete control over products, orders, messaging, and discussion board
Analytics tracking system for product clicks and content views
Product review system limited to verified purchasers only
In-app notification system for order updates and admin alerts

existing_features.title: Create a product management system where administrators can upload new products with details including name, description, price, images, and inventory quantity
Implement an order management dashboard where administrators can view all customer orders with status, items, customer details, and order date
Build an admin messaging system that allows administrators to send messages to customers
Create a customer authentication system using Internet Identity that allows customers who have purchased items to log in securely
Implement a customer order tracking portal where logged-in customers can view their purchase history and track current orders with shipping status
Build a social media content gallery that displays videos, photos, and messages from various social media platforms in a unified feed
Apply Mosslight Studios brand styling throughout the entire website using a dark emerald green primary color and cool light nude secondary color for the visual theme
Create a public-facing product catalog page where visitors can browse available products with images, descriptions, and prices
Implement a shopping cart and checkout flow that allows customers to add products, review their cart, and complete purchases
Create a public-facing discussion board page accessible from the main navigation that displays all questions and replies in a forum-style layout
Build a discussion post list component that displays all questions with author information, timestamps, status badges, and reply counts
Create a form component that allows authenticated customers to submit new questions to the discussion board
Build a discussion thread detail view that displays the full question and all replies with author identification for admin responses
Create a reply form component that allows admins to respond to questions directly in the thread view
Create React Query hooks for discussion board operations including fetching posts, creating posts, fetching thread details, and adding replies
Apply Mosslight Studios brand styling to all discussion board components using the existing dark emerald green and cool light nude color palette
Add a separate 'Admin Login' button below the regular customer login section in the authentication interface
Implement 8-digit passcode authentication system for admin access using the passcode 09131991
Create a unified admin dashboard that displays navigation to all admin management sections including products, orders, customer messaging, and discussion board
Update the Header component to show admin status and provide easy navigation to the admin dashboard when authenticated as admin
Wrap the admin routes and components in App.tsx with the AdminAuthProvider so that all components using the useAdminAuth hook have access to the admin authentication context
Create React Query hook for fetching unread notifications for the current user and marking notifications as read
Create a NotificationBell component in the Header that displays unread notification count badge and opens a dropdown panel showing recent notifications with timestamps and read/unread status
Add a Notifications section to the admin dashboard displaying admin-specific alerts including low inventory warnings and system notifications
Create React Query hook for fetching product reviews, submitting new reviews, and retrieving average ratings for products

Create a ProductReviews component that displays all reviews for a product with star ratings, review text, timestamps, and verified purchaser badges, shown on the ProductDetailPage below the product information
Create a ReviewForm component that allows authenticated customers who have purchased the product to submit a review with a star rating selector (1-5 stars) and text input
Update ProductCard component to display average star rating and review count for each product in the catalog grid
Create React Query hook for fetching analytics data including most clicked products, most viewed content, revenue metrics, and inventory alerts
Create an AdminAnalyticsPage displaying dashboard cards with key metrics including total revenue, order count, top clicked products, most viewed content, and low inventory alerts
Add Analytics navigation card to the AdminDashboardPage linking to the new analytics page
Update ProductCard component click handler to record product click analytics event when users click on products in the catalog
Update GalleryItem component to record content view analytics event when gallery content is viewed
Create a ProductSearch component with text input for searching products by name or description and dropdown filters for category and price range
Update ProductsPage to include the ProductSearch component above the product grid and filter displayed products based on search criteria
Create an AboutPage displaying Mosslight Studios business story, mission statement, and contact information with brand styling
Create an FAQPage displaying common questions and answers about shipping, returns, product care, and ordering process with collapsible accordion sections
Update Header navigation to include links to About and FAQ pages in the main menu
Create a SocialMediaLinks component displaying clickable icon links to Mosslight Studios social media profiles (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, etc.)
Update GalleryPage to display the SocialMediaLinks component prominently above or below the gallery content grid
Update Footer component to include the SocialMediaLinks component for consistent access to social profiles across all pages
Add routes in App.tsx for /about, /faq, and /admin/analytics pages with appropriate route configuration

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin backend: upload products, check orders, message customers
Customer login portal for order tracking
Video/content gallery displaying social media posts (messages, videos, photos)
Brand styling: dark emerald green and cool light nude color theme
Message board/forum for customer questions and admin responses
Create a backend data model for discussion board posts with fields for question text, author principal, timestamp, status (open/answered), and associated replies
Implement backend methods for customers to create new discussion posts with questions
Implement backend methods for admins to reply to discussion posts
Implement backend query methods to retrieve all discussion posts with their replies
Add separate admin login button below regular login with 8-digit passcode authentication (09131991)
Create unified admin dashboard with access to product management, order management, customer messaging, and discussion board management
Integrate Printify backend connection for product management
Implement backend method to verify admin passcode and establish admin session
Implement in-app notification system for customer order updates and admin alerts
Create product review system where verified customers can leave star ratings and written reviews
Display product reviews on individual product detail pages below the listing
Build admin analytics dashboard tracking product clicks, content views, sales metrics, and inventory alerts
Implement product search and filtering functionality by category and price range
Create About/Contact page with business story, mission, and contact information
Build FAQ section covering common questions about shipping, returns, and product care
Add clickable social media profile links integrated with content gallery
Implement low inventory alerts and out-of-stock notifications for admin

Create a backend data model for notifications with fields for recipient principal, notification type (order_update, admin_alert, low_inventory), message text, timestamp, read status, and optional order ID reference
Implement backend methods for creating notifications when order status changes, inventory falls below threshold (5 units), and for admin broadcast alerts
Implement backend query methods to retrieve unread notifications for the current user and mark notifications as read
Create a backend data model for product reviews with fields for product ID, reviewer principal, star rating (1-5), review text, timestamp, and verified purchase flag
Implement backend method for verified customers to submit product reviews only for products they have purchased, validating purchase history before allowing review submission
Implement backend query methods to retrieve all reviews for a specific product with average rating calculation and reviewer anonymization (showing only partial principal)

Create a backend data model for analytics events tracking product clicks, content gallery views, and order completions with timestamp, user principal (optional for anonymous), event type, and target ID
Implement backend methods to record analytics events when products are clicked, content items are viewed, and orders are completed
Implement backend query methods to retrieve analytics data including most clicked products, most viewed content, total revenue, order count by date range, and low inventory products (below 5 units)
